description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 12). Hans is stationed at Sveto and remains loyal to Poseidal when Giwaza rebels. He pilots the Heavy Metal Calvary Temple.

When Amandara Kamandara reveals himself as the true Poseidal, Hans accompanies Mian to the Lachesis shrine in her attempt to stop him, where he dies.
name: Hans Arahart
